overview.en: MBTChain：中文名称美比特，简称MBTC。是由新加坡My Mest基金会运营的新一代基于区块链技术建立的一个去中心化、分布式、可信任的全领域数据交换价值网络，让各个领域的数据都可以非常自由、相互信任、极度高效地共享交换，让数据逐渐远离垄断，信息不再有孤岛，让数据为商业和我们的生活提供更高的价值。 MBTChain具有高度可扩展性。开发者可以快速的在区块链上建立自己的应用，并共享MBTChain公链上千万级的用户和企业数据，其旨在建立行业间、用户间的数据传输和转换，在保证数据真实可靠的情况下，使行业间及用户间的数据价值最大化。
overview.zh: MBTChain: Chinese name Meibite, referred to as MBTC. It is a decentralized, distributed and trusted full-area data exchange value network based on blockchain technology operated by Singapore My Best Foundation, which enables data in all fields to be free, trustful and extremely Efficiently share and exchanges, let data move away from monopoly, and information no longer has islands, making data more valuable for business and our lives. MBTChain is highly scalable. Developers can quickly build their own applications on the blockchain and share millions of user and enterprise data in the MBTChain public chain, which aims to establish data transmission and conversion between industries and users, ensuring true and reliable data. In this case, the value of data between industries and users is maximized.
